hours_text:
**Exhibits****⋅Promotions****⋅****Gift Shop**

##### Museum Hours and Admission

**Museum****Hours  
**Wednesday – Saturday: 10 AM to 4 PM  
Sunday – Tuesday: Closed  
Holiday Closures: 1/1/2026  
Closing early at 1 PM on 12/31/2025

**Pay What You Wish Admission**  
Suggested minimum admission: $10/person  
The amount you pay for admission is up to you. We look to your generosity to help support the museum in sharing our archaeological history with the community.

* * *

##### Directions

**From I-15 North or South**

Exit I-15 at Via Rancho Parkway and go EAST. Continue around the shopping center.  
Turn RIGHT onto San Pasqual Road – 1 mile  
Turn RIGHT onto San Pasqual Valley Road (78). Continue past past the San Diego Zoo Safari Park – 6.4 mi.

The San Diego Archaeological Center will be on your left. Accessible parking is available next to the building by going up the short ramp on the left (west) side of the parking lot.

* * *

##### Exhibits

###### Current Exhibits

**Kumeyaay Cosmology** (on loan from the [Imperial Valley Desert Museum](https://www.ivdesertmuseum.org/)): This immersive exhibit explores the Kumeyaay people’s relationship with the seasons, stars, and celestial events.

**Fact or Fiction? Hoaxes, Hearsay, and Hollywood:** This exhibit investigates the scientific evidence (or lack thereof) for commonly held archaeological beliefs. Visitors can discover the facts behind aliens, crystal skulls, and more.

**Hallmarks of the Holocene:** This interactive ex...
admission_text:
The Center preserves millions of cultural resources from San Diego County and promotes the importance of cultural resources through exhibitions and programming for all ages. Membership at the San Diego Archaeological Center helps continue to preserve local history and entitles you to special benefits, such as free admission to the Museum, invitations to member events, and discounts on lectures and workshops. **Join or renew your membership now through February and receive 20% off!**

[**Purchase Membership**](https://app.etapestry.com/onlineforms/TheSanDiegoArchaeologicalCnt/annual-membership.html)

Membership can also be purchased over the phone at 760-291-0370 or by sending a check to the following address:

San Diego Archaeological Center  
Attn: Membership  
16666 San Pasqual Valley Road  
Escondido, CA 92027

* * *

##### Membership Levels & Benefits

**Membership Benefits for Individual~~($50)~~ $40**  
Includes membership for 1 individual

  * Free museum admission
  * Discount on event tickets
  * SDAC sticker
  * Reciprocal admission to 40+ museums in San Diego County during [The Big Exchange](https://sandiegoarchaeology.org/the-big-exchange/)

**Membership Benefits for Dual~~($85)~~ $67**  
Includes membership for up to 2 individuals (2nd individual can be listed as Guest of Member)

  * All of the above benefits plus
  * 2 guest passes to the museum
  * Invitation to member events

**Membership Benefits for Household~~($150)~~ $120**  
Includes membership for up to...
collections_text: The San Diego Archaeological Center is a nonprofit museum where visitors can learn the story of how people have lived in San Diego County for the past 12,000 years. Founded in 1993, the Center was the first private nonprofit dedicated to the care, management, and use of archaeological collections. Visit our museum, which is located in the picturesque San Pasqual Valley in Escondido, one mile…
